attributes.action: Vote of No Confidence in Boris Johnson
attributes.additional_details:
The UK citizens deserve a leader that can take charge, that has the best interests of all at heart, and that does not continuously lie to the public.

Now more than ever we need unity and beacon of light and hope following this pandemic and recession we are heading into and quite frankly Boris Johnson is not suitable as the leader of this country.
attributes.background: Boris Johnson has committed a endless series of U-Turns, has gone back on his manifesto promises (such as the pension triple lock, his promise to not rise income tax, VAT and National Insurance, along with his promise that no one should have to sell there house for social care)

rejection.details: We can't accept petitions about honours or appointments, which includes calling for Ministers or MPs to be sacked, resign, or to be subject to a recall vote or a vote of no confidence.
